ModMetaData.name: Industrial Lights by Nejellen
ModMetaData.author: Nejellen
ModMetaData.description:
A set of lights in a modern style for the industrial tech level. Includes 3 wall lights, 3 ceiling lights, 2 table lamps, and 1 standing lamp.
Requires OwlChemist's Simple Utilities: Ceiling and Simple Utilities: Wall.
